summary:
If you have a key you can lock the object back.

Should be good for roleplaying purposes, but it also can be useful for restricting enemy movement.
descriptionHtml:
[color=yellow]SKSE free and compatible with everything[/color]

If you have a key you can lock a door or a container.

[youtube]jQUBVLpwEMQ[/youtube]

There are a lot of mods that introduce the locking feature. But I find them a bit cheaty (since you can lock [u]any[/u]  object using a spell or even a lockpick). In contrast, in this mod you must have a key in your inventory.

[u]How to lock a door/chest?[/u]
- Unequip any weapon from your right hand
- Activate the object
- Select the Lock option

[u]Tactical application: 
[/u]You can [i]divide enemy forces[/i] by restricting their movement. For example, lure a person into a room and lock the door. You can even lock the enemy in a cage.
author: flexcreator
